nodes.text: Wookiee-wango was an alcoholic drink made with Sullustan gin. It was considered to be stronger than Gizer ale and lum, and was commonly shaken rather than stirred.

In 4 ABY, the Gran criminal Ree-Yees accepted a Wookiee-wango from R2-D2 while aboard Jabba Desilijic Tiure's sail barge, the Khetanna, shortly before its destruction. By 27 ABY, it was a popular drink on Coruscant.
